title: Porsche Unveils its First All-Electric Car
text:
At the same time Porsche drove its new Taycan onto the stage in Niagara Falls, Canada, it was also unveiled in Berlin and in Fuzhou, China. The three locations represent not only the major markets for this all-new electric battery sedan (Porsche’s first) but also some pillars of sustainability. Fuzhou, in Fujian Province, is the site of a major wind farm, and Neuharenberg, near Berlin, is home to a huge solar installation.

And Niagara Falls, well, it’s the poster child for hydroelectric power, isn’t it? (The Robert Moses...
description: The Taycan will start at $150,900 when it goes on sale by the end of 2019
